comments:
Build ID: Build id: I20070625-1500 (3.3.0)

Steps To Reproduce:
Install sleak
Install WTP plugins (probably any editor really)
Create a JSP
Open the JSP using WTP's JSP Editor
Close JSP
Press snap in sleak
Open/Close the same jsp using the JSP editor
Press diff in sleak.


The image looks like the disabled "cancel" red box (really gray) for the status line progress monitor. 

The following stack results:
